Question
========
What is a key risk of over-automation in AI-driven development?

Answerlist
----------
* Increased cloud costs
* Erosion of foundational coding skills
* Slower deployment cycles
* Better documentation
* Improved team communication
* More secure systems
* Enhanced user interfaces

Solution
========
Over-reliance on AI code assistants risks eroding foundational coding skills.
